embed.title: Welcome to the VTuber Academy!
embed.description:
This server is dedicated to providing tips, resources and support to aspiring VTubers who want to learn how to make entertaining content and grow their audiences!

This handbook is designed to get you up and running in our server, if you ever need the handbook again, just run /handbook in any chat!

embed.title: Serverwide Rules
embed.description: We don't intend to overhelm the members with rules but with the interest of making a friendly and comfortable environment for all members, we have laid out these rules:

fields.name: 0. By using an discord account, you adhere to the following:
fields.value:
Discord ToS: https://discord.com/terms
Community Guidelines: https://discord.com/guidelines

fields.name: 1. Server profile policy
fields.value:
`1.1 Nicknames / Usernames must be pingable
1.2 No NSFW or controversial avatars, banners, usernames or nicknames
1.3 No malicious links in "About me"`

fields.name: 2. Texting Policy
fields.value:
`2.1 Try to stay relevant to the channel
2.2 Avoid spamming
2.3 No NSFW, Political and religion talks
2.4 Keep drama to a minimum
2.5 This is an english speaking community! Try to speak english only if possible.
2.6 We ask that you treat everyone with respect`

fields.name: 3. Voice Policy
fields.value:
`3.1 Don't purposely be loud or high pitched
3.2 General Texting policy applies to voicerooms`

fields.name: 4. Direct Messaging
fields.value: Policies listed here applies to DMs where both parties never interacted privately with each other before. This is not enforceable but if a breach is reported, it may lead to a ban based on your server activity.

embed.title: Moderation Policy
embed.description: All moderators reserves the rights to take any action incase of any breaches to this system.

fields.name: Disclaimer
fields.value: Abusing any loopholes in the rules are strictly not tolerated. They are simplified for your understanding.

fields.name: When will a user get banned?
fields.value: Our moderation policy consists of a strikes system. When the moderation deems that it is time for an action, you will be judged.

fields.name: Community Involvement
fields.value: Do not do callouts in public chat. The community can help maintain peace by reporting violations when they happen! You can use the /report command or right click a message and report or DM VTA-Modmail or Modmail bot directly!

embed.title: Server Roles
embed.description: There are a lot of channels that only specific members with certain roles can view, you can get some of these special items through "Channels & Roles" at the top of the channel list!

fields.name: Admins and Mods
fields.value: We don't differentiate members with different powers, admins and staff are coloured purple while moderators are camoflauged in the memberlist! If you need to contact a moderator or report them, please use VTA ModMail.

fields.name: Gaming Club Roles
fields.value: We sure do have a gaming community within the server! To access the ~~basement~~ streets, grab some roles from "Channels & Roles" at the top of the channel list!

fields.name: VTuber and Artist Roles
fields.value: We value a user's work and identity, for this reason we have many processing for these roles, to get started use /Application enroll

fields.name: Voice Channels
fields.value: To use voice channels, we have made it so that you need to be activity level 3 to join. It's a security enforcement to prevent trolls and raids.

embed.title: Community Engagement
embed.description: Watch out! VTA Bot has more to offer than good ol plain moderation and applications handling! Make sure your DMs are open!!!

embed.title: Frequently Asked Questions!
embed.description: This is a rather new discord feature but you can find frequently asked questions in the server guide at the top of the channel!
